label: not planned/autopsy
description: Radiation therapy was not administered because it was not part of the planned first-course treatment. Diagnosed at autopsy.

label: patient risk factors
description: Radiation therapy was not administered because it was contraindicated due to patient risk factors (comorbid conditions, advanced age, etc).

label: patient death
description: Radiation therapy was not administered because the patient died prior to planned or recommended treatment.

label: recommended, not administered, NOS
description: Radiation therapy was not administered; it was recommended by the patient's physician, but was not administered as part of the first-course therapy. No reason was noted in the patient's record.

label: recommended, refused
description: Radiation therapy was not administered; it was recommended by the patient's physician, but this treatment was refused by the patient, the patient's family member, or the patient's guardian. The refusal was noted in the patient record.

label: recommended, unknown if administered
description: Radiation therapy was recommended, but it is unknown if it was administered.
